author: Reuters Editorial
title: South African hospital operator Netcare reports H1 profit rise
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Netcare, South Africa’s second-largest private hospital firm, reported a 8.5 percent rise in half-year earnings on Monday.
Adjusted diluted headline earnings per share (EPS) from continuing operations, the main metric for South African companies, rose to 87.7 cents for the six months to March 31.
Reporting by Sangameswaran S in Bengaluru; editing by Jason Neely
